page.title: 02Daily Routine
page.content:
records and talk. At about 6.0pm we have our evening meal. We are vegetarians and have lots of different things for dinner. We might have chips, pizza and fried eggs or baked beans, tomatoes, potatoes and onion with a breadcrumb topping; or in winter, a favorite meal is cabbage, potatoes, carrots and nut roast with gravy. After dinner, I go for a bicycle ride around St.Nicholas Park Estate. I usually go with a friend. I go to bed around 10.30pm and read or listen to music until 11.00pm.
During term-time, my alarm clock goes off at 7.25am but I always stay asleep until 8.03am, when my mum comes in and wakes me up. I then get dressed, have my breakfast and call round for Steven. From there we go to school. We
